Question: On 9 November 1867, this person sailed from Liverpool for his second American reading tour.
Hints: Claire Tomalin's book, The Invisible Woman, argues that Ternan lived with this person secretly for the last 13 years of his life.
This person was the most popular novelist of his time, and remains one of the best known and most read of English authors.
This person fell deeply in love with one of the actresses, Ellen Ternan, which was to last the rest of his life.
